profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.8 Embedded files - F and UF keys
profile.description: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file shall contain the F and UF keys
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file shall contain the F and UF keys

error.message: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file does not contain either F or EF key
